statements: SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, configuration FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT device_id, device_name, updated_at FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location LIKE '%Kitchen%' ORDER BY updated_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_type, COUNT(*) FROM smart_home_devices GROUP BY device_type;
SELECT device_name, configuration->'temperature' AS temperature FROM smart_home_devices WHERE configuration->'temperature' > 20;
SELECT device_name, created_at FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat' OR device_type = 'Light';
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM device_settings INNER JOIN smart_home_devices ON device_settings.device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id WHERE smart_home_devices.device_location = 'Bedroom';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Lighting' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type IN ('Speaker', 'Camera') LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT d.device_name, ds.setting_name, ds.setting_value FROM smart_home_devices d JOIN device_settings ds ON d.device_id = ds.device_id WHERE d.device_type = 'Hub' AND ds.setting_value = 'ON';

SELECT d.device_name, ds.setting_name, ds.setting_value FROM smart_home_devices d JOIN device_settings ds ON d.device_id = ds.device_id WHERE d.device_location LIKE '%Kitchen%' ORDER BY device_name ASC, setting_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM configurations WHERE config_name LIKE '%default%';
SELECT settings_id, setting_name, setting_value FROM settings ORDER BY setting_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_name, config_name, config_value FROM devices JOIN configurations ON devices.device_id = configurations.device_id;
SELECT device_name, setting_name, setting_value FROM devices JOIN settings ON devices.device_id = settings.device_id WHERE setting_name = 'Brightness';
SELECT device_name, config_name, setting_name FROM devices JOIN configurations ON devices.device_id = configurations.device_id JOIN settings ON devices.device_id = settings.device_id;
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM SmartHomeDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_type='smart_light';
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM DeviceUsers;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_type='thermostat';
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_name = 'Thermostat';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_type = 'Light';
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_type = 'Speaker';
SELECT * FROM DeviceSettings WHERE setting_name = 'Volume';
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM DeviceSettings WHERE setting_value >= '50';
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_status = true;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_type = 'Light';
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM SmartHomeDevices ORDER BY device_type ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_status = false ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM SmartHomeDevices WHERE device_type = 'Light';
SELECT device_name, config_name, config_value FROM SmartHomeDevices JOIN DeviceConfigurations ON SmartHomeDevices.device_id = DeviceConfigurations.device_id;
SELECT * FROM DeviceRoomMapping JOIN RoomConfigurations ON DeviceRoomMapping.room_id = RoomConfigurations.room_id WHERE DeviceRoomMapping.device_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM UserSettings WHERE notification_preference = TRUE;
